snippet: The larger issue of the harm to homeowners from foreclosures triggered by the collapse in the housing market has not yet been addressed in any criminal prosecutions, according to White Collar Watch.
abstract: The larger issue of the harm to homeowners from foreclosures triggered by the collapse in the housing market has not yet been addressed in any criminal prosecutions, according to White Collar Watch.

headline.main: Bank Is Victim in Financial Crisis Case, Not Homeowners
